# SCNProgramCompilationError

**Global Variable**

An error in compiling GLSL shader source code for use with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNProgram] class.

## Declaration

```swift
var SCNProgramCompilationError: Int { get }
```
